```{r}
aad <- read.csv("data/aad.csv")
removed_na <- subset(aad, !is.na(aad$Cutaneous.Leishmaniasis))
missing_to_zero <- aad
missing_to_zero$Cutaneous.Leishmaniasis[is.na(missing_to_zero$Cutaneous.Leishmaniasis)] <- 0
View(aad)
```
